alert.note: Alert for Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 12:23PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Piscataquis and north central Penobscot Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1223 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Telos Lake, or 15 miles north of Mount Katahdin, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mount Katahdin, Katahdin Woods and Waters National Monument, South Branch Pond, Telos Lake, Baxter State Park and Katahdin Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
